shortdesc.ph: Open the intercommunication with the Web SDK (applicable only in the live broadcast scene).

dlentry.dd: As of v3.0.0, the Native SDK automatically enables interoperability with the Web SDK, so you no longer need to call this method.

section.p: Enables interoperability with the Agora Web SDK. If the channel has Web SDK users, ensure that you call this method, or the video of the Native user will be a black screen for the Web user.
This method is only applicable in live broadcast scenarios, and intercommunication is enabled by default in communication scenarios.

plentry.pd:
Enables interoperability with the Agora Web SDK.
Enable Interoperability
: (Default) Disable intercommunication.
